reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 330/16: REAL PROPERTY OWNED BY THE LIQUOR CONTROL BOARD OF ONTARIO
reg_info.reg_name_text: REAL PROPERTY OWNED BY THE LIQUOR CONTROL BOARD OF ONTARIO

content.content: 1. The following assets are designated as qualifying assets for the purposes of the Act: 1. Real property owned by the Liquor Control Board of Ontario in the City of Toronto at the addresses known municipally as 95 Lake Shore Boulevard East, 15 Freeland Street and 8 and 15 Cooper Street.
content.raw_html:
1. The following assets are designated as qualifying assets for the purposes of the Act:

1. Real property owned by the Liquor Control Board of Ontario in the City of Toronto at the addresses known municipally as 95 Lake Shore Boulevard East, 15 Freeland Street and 8 and 15 Cooper Street.

content.content: 2. This Regulation applies with respect to the following assets:  1. The real property owned by the Liquor Control Board of Ontario described in paragraph 3 of subsection 3 (1) of the Act. 2. The real property owned by the Liquor Control Board of Ontario designated in section 1 of this Regulation.
content.raw_html:
2. This Regulation applies with respect to the following assets:

1. The real property owned by the Liquor Control Board of Ontario described in paragraph 3 of subsection 3 (1) of the Act.

2. The real property owned by the Liquor Control Board of Ontario designated in section 1 of this Regulation.

content.content: 3. For the purposes of section 6 of the Act, the following amount in connection with the disposition of the assets is to be credited to the Trillium Trust promptly after this section comes into force: 1. $246,215,325, being 100 per cent of the designated proceeds of disposition, as determined under section 4 of the Act.
content.raw_html:
3. For the purposes of section 6 of the Act, the following amount in connection with the disposition of the assets is to be credited to the Trillium Trust promptly after this section comes into force:

1. $246,215,325, being 100 per cent of the designated proceeds of disposition, as determined under section 4 of the Act.

content.section: Designated proceeds of disposition — s. 4 of the Act
content.content: 4. For the purposes of paragraph 2 of section 4 of the Act, $3,553,741 is prescribed as the amount of costs incurred by the Crown in connection with the disposition.
content.raw_html: 4. For the purposes of paragraph 2 of section 4 of the Act, $3,553,741 is prescribed as the amount of costs incurred by the Crown in connection with the disposition.

content.section: Designated proceeds of disposition — s. 4 of the Act
content.content: 5. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation).
content.raw_html: 5. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation).

content.section: Designated proceeds of disposition — s. 4 of the Act
